import React, {useState} from "react"; import ReactDelayRender from "react-delay-render"; import FadeIn from "react-fade-in"; import Collapsible from "react-collapsible"; import SkillItem from "./SkillItem/SkillItem"; import "./Skills.css"; const Skills = () => { const [tabOpen, setTabOpen] = useState(-1); return (
setTabOpen(1)} onClosing={() => setTabOpen(-1)} open={tabOpen===1} trigger="Technical Skills">

Here is a list of things I know about and absolutely subjective scale of my familiarity with them:

...and numerous other small libraries!

setTabOpen(2)} open={tabOpen===2} trigger="Other Skills" onClosing={() => setTabOpen(-1)}>

And here a couple of other skills that I have gained throughout my career:

setTabOpen(3)} open={tabOpen===3} trigger="Hobbies/Interests">

My main hobbies include weightlifting, video and board games, cooking and comedy of different kinds. Outside of web development, my passions include nutrition science, fitness and evolutionary psychology, video games industry. I love problem-solving and puzzles of all sorts and I am an active member of British Mensa.

); }; export default ReactDelayRender({ delay: 401 })(Skills);
